## âš¡ Actions

Windows Display Settings, for Stream Deck, lets you control your display settings with ease!

-   Use HDR (per monitor!)
-   Resolution
-   Orientation
-   Project (Extend, Duplicate, etc.)

Windows Display Settings is licenced under [GNU General Public License v3 (GPL-3)](LICENSE.md), and is available free-of-charge on the Elgato Stream Deck store.
